title: Is Google just passing around defective phones are replacements?
content:
I've been buying all the latest nexus and Pixel phones since nexus 1.
Over the time I've had to get replacements for my own Pixel and others around me.
Recently I've noticed everytime we get replacements they're defective. I got my pixel 4 xl replaced and the refurbished replacement seemed used. It's also more defective that the original with random reboots and serious network issues.

So my question is, is it me or is Google just passing around different people's defective phones thinking your original issue will get fixed and cross fingers you won't notice any new issues?
It certainly looks that way to me. So I've had enough and returned the pixel 5...
